head.title: Home - Effingham Community Schools

input.name: __VIEWSTATE

a.title: Go to Effingham Junior High School

a.h1: Effingham Community Schools Board of Education
a.div: Where the Search for Excellence Begins

div.style: position: absolute; left: 0px; top: 0px; z-index: 100001; background-color: rgb(170, 170, 170); opacity: 0.5; display: none;

span.br:
We created a special "EMERGENCY INFORMATION" page to help ensure parents and community members have the most up to date information. The tab is located at the top of the main menu. Please refer to it for the following information:
1. Notifications from Superintendent Doan. Mr. Doan is working directly with local and state health officials along with the Illinois State Board of Education.
2. Extended learning opportunities for your children.
Please check back often as the we are continually adding to the list of information. Thanks in advance for your support!

h5.style: box-sizing: inherit; margin: 0px 0px 0.357em; padding: 0px; border: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 1rem; line-height: 1.375rem; color: rgb(195, 33, 31);

p.style: margin-bottom: 6px; font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(28, 30, 33); letter-spacing: normal;

p.span: Welcome to Effingham Unit #40. We are excited to share the story of our students' journey towards academic excellence. Every day, a team of dedicated teachers, administrators and support staff collaborate with one another in an effort to prepare our students for the global stage.

span.style: font-size: medium; letter-spacing: 0.3px; font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

br.span: For your convenience, we put together a

a.style: font-size: medium; font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; letter-spacing: 0.3px; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; box-sizing: inherit; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; color: rgb(248, 148, 31);

strong.style: box-sizing: inherit; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background: transparent;

span.style: font-size: medium; letter-spacing: 0.3px; font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

br.span: that provides our stakeholders with the ability to view how the district uses its resources to ensure student growth is occurring. [This site is best viewed in Chrome.]

p.style: box-sizing: inherit; margin: 0px 0px 15px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
p.span: The dashboard provides users with a unique view of how the district's learning environment and financial resources are used to ensure student success.

p.style: box-sizing: inherit; margin: 0px 0px 15px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
p.span: Additional information, including the school report card, is available on the district's academic performance page.

p.style: box-sizing: inherit; margin: 0px 0px 15px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
p.span: In closing, we want to thank the community for its ongoing support and providing us with the ability to create an environment "where the search for excellence" occurs in classrooms across the district on a daily basis.

p.style: box-sizing: inherit; margin: 0px 0px 15px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; outline: 0px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 13.008px;

strong.style: box-sizing: inherit; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background: transparent;

br.span: Click the employment icon to search our current job listings. We'd love for you to consider joining the Unit #40 Team.
